patthana8.12:1.1: Nalokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nalokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nalokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokiyo ca nalokuttaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.12:2.1: Nalokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.12:3.1: Nalokiyañca nalokuttarañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.12:4.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
